5.13. 
Inheritance rights of spouses
The surviving spouse inherits by operation of law or with the first or second heirs (if any). He/she shall inherit with the heirs of the first succession one quarter of the estate if there are not more than three heirs, excluding the spouse. If there are more than three heirs, the spouse shall inherit equally with the other heirs. If the spouse inherits with the second heirs, he/she shall inherit half of the estate. In the absence of first and second heirs, the spouse shall inherit the whole estate.
